examples.en: The soldiers closed ranks.
The soldiers ran out of ammo.
The soldiers have been stood to.
examples.ru: Солдаты были приведены в боевую готовность.

examples.en: The soldiers were killed in an ambush.
The wounded soldiers were shipped home.
Pakistani soldiers
The soldiers were fired.
The soldiers were popping.
40 captured French soldiers
Soldiers fired on the crowd.
Today we honor our soldiers.
The soldiers fired on the enemy.
All the soldiers carried rifles.
examples.ru: Все солдаты имели при себе винтовки.

examples.en: We salute our country's soldiers.
examples.ru: Мы приветствуем / чествуем солдат нашей страны.

examples.en: The novel concerns three soldiers.
examples.ru: В романе рассказывается о трёх солдатах.

examples.en: The soldiers resisted for two days.
examples.ru: Солдаты оказывали сопротивление в течение двух дней.

examples.en: He inspected the soldiers' barracks.
The soldiers were ordered to dig in.
No places of cantonment for soldiers.
They were captured by enemy soldiers.
examples.ru: Они были захвачены в плен вражескими солдатами.

examples.en: Most of our soldiers are raw recruits.
examples.ru: Большинство наших солдат являются неопытными новобранцами.

examples.en: The soldiers formed into battle order.
The soldiers blew up the enemy bridge.
Most soldiers are only boys in uniform.
examples.ru: Большинство солдат — всего лишь мальчишки в военной форме.

examples.en: Enemy soldiers set the building alight.
The soldiers were severely reprimanded.
Several hundred soldiers have deserted.
Soldiers stand guard on street corners.
examples.ru: Солдаты стоят на страже на углах улиц.

examples.en: The soldiers marched across the border.
Many soldiers were killed in the ambush.
examples.ru: В этой засаде погибло много солдат.
